column1: mary ellen cheshire| mary ellen cheshire. born: june 21
column8: 2015 at suwannee health care center. she was a native and life-long resident of live oak. mary was a bus driver for the suwannee county school system and loved fishing and reading. she was a member of the philadelphia baptist church. she is survived by four brothers
column12: bob cheshire and don (linda) cheshire all of live oak. one brother
column15: fl; six grandchildren and four great grandchildren. graveside services will be held 10:00 am
column19: 2015 in the philadelphia baptist church cemetery with rev. josh wynn officiating. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
